title: IKS d.o.o.
segmentation: I would like to launch the next company.
Hello, my name is Branko Ikita.
I'm a CEO of a small company and our main core business main interest is implementing computer vision methods.
And of course, together with this methods we also develop some algorithms we we test this algorithms because our main goal is that our our programs are working and are are good for commercial use.
Not only we are not only doing a research but are also trying to make commercial products.
So we are implementing computer vision methods in video surveillance, traffic control, industrial quality inspection and medical diagnosis.
Also, we do some development of database applications using XML and SQL.
So to be more specific, we have our own video surveillance systems system.
That system was was constructed was made by us from scratch, so all the old or the software oil everything came from from our from our house and we support many types.
I can say every type of camera that is also supported by Microsoft Direct.
And direct show.
So we have also developed our own object tracking system.
Which is able to track multiple moving objects suitable for example in anti terroristic projects.
What we are now planning is to incorporate some some some knowledge about tracking and other stuff into our video surveillance system.
For example we would like to expand our surveillance system with the possibility of virtual lines.
For example providing alarms if somebody crosses.
Just one line then.
For example, detection of forgotten packages.
For example, if some packages there for 1/2 an hour, maybe an hour, we can detect this and provide an alarm.
OK, we have also successful programs in medical diagnostics products that really work.
For example in fundus analyzes.
This is a special medical equipment that is the only equipment that can show blood versus.
I honor honor on the screen and we have software that measures that versus.
I have not many many time to to go into other details.
I would just say that where is our knowledge and experience in computer vision field and algorithms and video technology.
And we are looking partners also not not not only from research institutes and so on, but also from from a business companies.
As I said, we would like to broaden our surveillance system with more intelligence with more logic.
OK, thank you very much.
